title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard of Mahogany and Inlay
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed:
Inscriptions re front view - in pen and black ink bottom left: FRONT; upper center: DRAWER; at right: TWO DRAWERS AT TOP / SHELF IN CUPBOARDS
Inscriptions re end view - in pen and black ink, bottom, center: END
Inscription re plan view - at right: SIDEBOARD OF MAHOGANY AND INLAY / inch scale; bottom, center: LINE OF TOP / PLAN; at right: DOTTED LINES SHOW / SECTION THRD.[?] CUPBOARDS; inside plan, center: LINE OF TOP SHELF; at bottom: BOTTOM SHELF
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Front, "end," and plan views of rectangular mahogany sideboard with inlay; front view shows rectangular sideboard with cylindrical legs flaring up from paw feet and has knee space at center topped with single drawer flanked by cupboards; wine cooler on top; backsplash carved with acanthus leaves; shelves hold fruit vase, glass, and wine decanter.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-10
